name: AVAS
body:
AVAS

What is AVAS?

Avas is short for Alex Vegas App Store. This Store contains a collection of well designed and powerful apps for the android paltform. All these apps are open source. They have all been tested for security and functiomality and passed both test with flying colours.

How do I install an APK?

Download the APK from a safe source. Then, go to Settings>Security and make sure that "Unknown Sources" is checked. After that, head over to a file amanger and navigate to the folder that contains the APK and tap on the file. Android will ask you wheether you want to install this app. Click on"yes" and install the file. You're all set! Congrats!

APPS

Al3x V3gas

This app brings the official website of Al3x V3gas to your android-powered device. The App was built with AppsGeyser.

Download the app here: al3xv3gas.apk

Adaway

Want to to remove annoying ads? Then this is the app for you! What does it do? It downloads a hosts file and installs it. This hosts file prevents ads from getting onto your device.

Download the app here: AdAway.apk

Amaze

A powerful material-design, open source file manager. This file manager also has many archive utilities installed out of the box!

Download the app here: Amaze.apk

Firefox

Firefox is an open source browser. It has a plethora of add-ons, easily-installable via the Mozilla add-on Store.

Download the app here: Firefox.apk

Github Mobile

This app brings Github to your device. Login and browse repositories, view issues or check out code that may help you to build a great experience.

Download the app here: GitHub.apk

Ice Cat

This browser is a fork of Firefox. The aim of Ice Cat is that it's as open and powerfull as Firefox but doesn't promote or allow non free add-ons.

Download the app here: IceCat.apk

Timber

This music player is a beautiful mix of material design and functionality. It is very powerfull and plays only in HQ.

Download the app here: Timber.apk

Telegram

The popular open source messenger is a Whatsapp subsitute that offers many cool and practical features. It combines functionality with beauty.

Download the app here: Telegram.apk

Termux

A material design Terminal, that offers a wide range of packages such as Python, GCC or Vim and Ruby. Definitely the best terminal emulator out there.

Download the app here: Termux.apk

Turbo Editor

A material design editor with syntax-colouring and a smooth material UI. Furthermore, it is open source.

Download the app here: TurboEditor.apk
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
